ID.title: ID
ID.description: Captures the ID for the device.

pricingOptions.title: Pricing Options
pricingOptions.description: Captures if the device will be paid for in installments or full retail price.

earlyUpgradeEnrollment.title: Early Upgrade Enrollment
earlyUpgradeEnrollment.description: Captures if the customer opts into early upgrades.

insuranceEnrollment.title: Insurance Enrollment
insuranceEnrollment.description: Captures if the customer opts into device insurance.

planLevel.title: Plan Level
planLevel.description: Captures the name of the mobile plan assigned to this device.

phoneNumber.title: Phone Number
phoneNumber.description: Captures the phone number assigned to this device.

portedNumber.title: Ported Number
portedNumber.description: Captures if the customer ports their number from another carrier.

media5GAccess.title: 5G Access
media5GAccess.description: Captures if the device is eligible for 5G Access.

mediaRolloverData.title: Rollover Data
mediaRolloverData.description: Captures if the device plan includes rollover data.

mediaMobileHotspot.title: Mobile Hotspot
mediaMobileHotspot.description: Captures if the device plan includes mobile hotspot ability.

mediaCloudStorageIncluded.title: Cloud Storage Included
mediaCloudStorageIncluded.description: Captures if the device plan includes cloud data storage.

hdVideo.title: HD Video
hdVideo.description: Captures if the device plan includes HD video.
